mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no, q.m_no, m.m_name, q.qna_context, q.qna_passwd, q.qna_regdate, q.qna_title, q.privateck FROM qna q inner join member m on q.m_no = m.m_no WHERE q.qna_no = #{qna_no}

select count(1) from qna WHERE 1=1
AND q.qna_context like concat('%', ${searchKeyword}, '%')
SELECT count(1) as cnt FROM member where m_id = #{m_id};
